review: Bought during pre-Xmas sale as a stocking filler. For the price it is an amazing addition to our entertainment options. Super easy operations and now have available a myriad of programmes and games both free and via Amazon. Totally opened a new world of available options for weekends when cable TV is devoid of originality. Cannot recommend it highly enough for price, ease of use, and the things available on it

review: I love it. I have had it for about 2 weeks and it is so easy to hook up and operate.  I set it up and the tutorial was so simple to follow.  I recommend the fire TV stick to anyone that has a HD TV....I thought I would buy a "smart" TV but now for a fraction of the cost, I have the same capabilities.
